analysis.description:
BasketToken.create has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(erc20.transferFrom(msg.sender,address(this),amount)) (/unique_chucks/20/0x50ea56f90e09f9c306c164eb4ddd9b7e1105a156.sol#428-429)

BasketToken.redeem has external calls inside a loop:
	- require(bool)(erc20.transfer(msg.sender,amount)) (/unique_chucks/20/0x50ea56f90e09f9c306c164eb4ddd9b7e1105a156.sol#467-468)
